None.Name: Gifted Catch
None.Description: Activate to teleport any targeted hostile unit within a 30m radius to the caster. The target unit will then be rooted to the ground for 12 seconds. Rooted units are immobile but may still use ranged attacks and special abilities. After the effect wears off, targets are immune against Root for a while. Reusable every 30 seconds.

None.Name: Tunneling
None.Description: Activate to teleport to the Tunnel Exit (if it exists). Reusable every 20 seconds.
